Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback

    public class MainActivity
extends android.app.Activity
implements PlaybackControlLayer.FullscreenCallback
    Displays a list of videos and plays them when they are selected.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MainActivity.VideoListItem
      Simple class to bundle together the title, content video, and ad tag associated with a video.
